00037 void CalvinToText::error(const AffxString& strMessage)
00038 {
00039         Err::errAbort(strMessage);

00041 
00042 void CalvinToText::run(const std::string strFileNameIn, const std::string strFileNameOut, bool bHeader, bool bBody, bool bNewGuid)
00043 {
00044         try 
00045         {
00046                 if (isCalvinFile(strFileNameIn))
00047                 {               
00048                         m_strFileNameIn = strFileNameIn;
00049                         m_strFileNameOut = strFileNameOut;
00050                         AffxByteArray chpFileName;
00051                         chpFileName.assign(strFileNameIn);
00052                         AffxFile file;
00053                         Verbose::out(1, "Writing file: " + strFileNameOut);
00054                         if (m_file.open(strFileNameOut, AffxFile::SAVE))
00055                         {       
00056                                 m_bHeader = bHeader;
00057                                 affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData genericData;
00058                                 OutputHeader(strFileNameIn, genericData, bNewGuid);
00059                                 if (bBody)
00060                                 {
00061                                         OutputGroupsAndSets(genericData);
00062                                 }
00063                                 m_file.close();
00064                         }
00065                         else 
00066                         {
00067                                 Err::errAbort("A problem occurred while processing file (Cannot open output file) " + strFileNameIn);
00068                         }
00069                 }
00070         } 
00071 
00072 //When things go wrong see if we can die gracefully here. 
00073   catch(Except &e) {
00074     Verbose::out(0,"");
00075     error("Exception caught. "
00076                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00077   }
00078   catch(const std::bad_alloc &e) {
00079     Verbose::out(0,"");
00080         error("std::bad_alloc caught. "
00081                   "The application has run out of memory, or the calvin file is malformed."
00082                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00083   }
00084   catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException &ce) {
00085     Verbose::out(0,"");
00086         error("affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException caught. "
00087                                   "Affymetrix GeneChip Command Console library has thrown an exception. "
00088                   "Message is: " + affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ce.Description()));
00089   }
00090   catch(BroadException &e) {
00091     Verbose::out(0,"");
00092         error("BroadException caught. "
00093                   "Message is: '" + ToStr(e.m_msg) + "' source file: '" + ToStr(e.m_sourcefile) +
00094                   ":" + ToStr(e.m_sourceline) + "'");
00095   }
00096   catch(const std::exception &e) {
00097     Verbose::out(0,"");
00098         error("std::exception caught. "
00099                   "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00100   }
00101   catch(...) {
00102     Verbose::out(0,"");
00103     error("Unknown exception caught. "
00104                   "No message is available.");
00105   }
00106 }

00108 /*
00109  * Read the file into a data object.
00110  */
00111 bool CalvinToText::ReadFile(const string &fileName, GenericData &gdata)
00112 {
00113         GenericFileReader reader;
00114 
00115         // Read the file.
00116         reader.SetFilename(fileName);
00117         try
00118         {
00119                 reader.ReadHeader(gdata);
00120         }
00121         catch(...)
00122         {
00123                 return false;
00124         }
00125         return true;
00126 }

00128 /*
00129  * Output the data to the command line.
00130  */
00131 void CalvinToText::OutputData(GenericData& gdata, int groupIndex, int setIndex, int startRow, int endRow)
00132 {
00133         DataSet *set = gdata.DataSet(groupIndex, setIndex);
00134         set->Open();
00135 
00136         // Output the rows of data
00137         int8_t i8;
00138         u_int8_t iu8;
00139         int16_t i16;
00140         u_int16_t iu16;
00141         int32_t i32;
00142         u_int32_t iu32;
00143         float f32;
00144         std::string s;
00145         std::wstring ws;
00146         int nRows = set->Rows();
00147         int nCols = set->Cols();
00148         startRow = Min(Max(startRow, 0), nRows-1);
00149         if (startRow < 0) {startRow = 0;}
00150         if (endRow < 0) {endRow = nRows-1;}
00151         endRow = Min(endRow, nRows-1);
00152         AffxString strColumnName;
00153         int iDetectionColumn = -1;
00154         int iGenotypeCallColumn = -1;
00155         int iForcedGenotypeCallColumn = -1;
00156         int iChromosomeColumn = -1;
00157         if (nCols > 0)
00158         {
00159                 for (int col=0; col<nCols; col++)
00160                 {
00161                         if (col != 0) {m_file.write("\t");}
00162                         strColumnName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(set->Header().GetColumnInfo(col).GetName()).c_str();
00163                         if (strColumnName == "Detection") {iDetectionColumn = col;}
00164                         else if (strColumnName == "Call") {iGenotypeCallColumn = col;}
00165                         else if (strColumnName == "Forced Call") {iForcedGenotypeCallColumn = col;}
00166                         else if (strColumnName == "Chromosome") {iChromosomeColumn = col;}
00167                         m_file.write(strColumnName.c_str());
00168                 }
00169                 m_file.writeLine("");
00170         }
00171         for (int row=startRow; row<=endRow; row++)
00172         {
00173                 for (int col=0; col<nCols; col++)
00174                 {
00175                         if (col != 0) {m_file.write("\t");}
00176                         switch (set->Header().GetColumnInfo(col).GetColumnType())
00177                         {
00178                         case ByteColType:
00179                                 set->GetData(row, col, i8);
00180                                 m_file.write(::getInt((int)i8).c_str());
00181                                 break;
00182                         case UByteColType:
00183                                 set->GetData(row, col, iu8);
00184                                 if (col == iDetectionColumn) 
00185                                 {
00186                                         switch(iu8) 
00187                                         {
00188                                         case 0: m_file.write("P"); break;
00189                                         case 1: m_file.write("M"); break;
00190                                         case 2: m_file.write("A"); break;
00191                                         case 3: m_file.write("N"); break;
00192                                         default: m_file.write(::getInt((int)iu8).c_str());
00193                                         }
00194                                 }
00195                                 else if ((col == iGenotypeCallColumn) || (col == iForcedGenotypeCallColumn)) 
00196                                 {
00197                                         switch(iu8) 
00198                                         {
00199                                         case 6: m_file.write("AA"); break;
00200                                         case 8: m_file.write("AB"); break;
00201                                         case 7: m_file.write("BB"); break;
00202                                         case 11: m_file.write("NC"); break;
00203                                         default: m_file.write(::getInt((int)iu8).c_str());
00204                                         }
00205                                 }
00206                                 else if (col == iChromosomeColumn)
00207                                 {
00208                                         if ((m_iXChromosome != -1) && (m_iXChromosome == iu8)) {m_file.write("X");}
00209                                         else if ((m_iXChromosome != -1) && (m_iYChromosome == iu8)) {m_file.write("Y");}
00210                                         else  {m_file.write(::getInt((int)iu8).c_str());}
00211                                 }
00212                                 else {m_file.write(::getInt((int)iu8).c_str());}
00213                                 break;
00214                         case ShortColType:
00215                                 set->GetData(row, col, i16);
00216                                 m_file.write(::getInt(i16).c_str());
00217                                 break;
00218                         case UShortColType:
00219                                 set->GetData(row, col, iu16);
00220                                 m_file.write(::getInt(iu16).c_str());
00221                                 break;
00222                         case IntColType:
00223                                 set->GetData(row, col, i32);
00224                                 m_file.write(::getInt(i32).c_str());
00225                                 break;
00226                         case UIntColType:
00227                                 set->GetData(row, col, iu32);
00228                                 m_file.write(::getUnsignedInt(iu32).c_str());
00229                                 break;
00230                         case FloatColType:
00231                                 set->GetData(row, col, f32);
00232                                 m_file.write(::getDouble(f32, 6).c_str());
00233                                 break;
00234                         case ASCIICharColType:
00235                                 set->GetData(row, col, s);
00236                                 m_file.write(s.c_str());
00237                                 break;
00238                         case UnicodeCharColType:
00239                                 set->GetData(row, col, ws);
00240                                 m_file.write(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ws).c_str());
00241                                 break;
00242                         default:
00243                                 break;
00244                         }
00245                 }
00246                 m_file.writeLine("");
00247         }
00248         set->Close();
00249         set->Delete();
00250 }

00252 /*
00253  * Output the file header parameters.
00254  */
00255 void CalvinToText::OutputFileHeaderParameters(GenericData &gdata, bool bNewGuid)
00256 {
00257 //      cout << "#File Header Information" << endl;
00258 
00259         if (m_bHeader)
00260         {
00261                 if (bNewGuid)
00262                 {
00263                         m_file.writeLine("#%File=" + m_strFileNameOut);
00264                         m_file.writeLine("#%FileCreationTime=" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString()));
00265                 }
00266                 else
00267                 {
00268                         m_file.writeLine("#%File=" + m_strFileNameIn);
00269                         m_file.writeLine("#%FileSize=" + ::getUnsignedInt(AffxFile::getFileSize(m_strFileNameIn)));
00270                         if (gdata.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileCreationTime().length() > 0)
00271                         {
00272                                 m_file.writeLine("#%FileCreationTime=" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(gdata.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileCreationTime()));
00273                         }
00274                         // Output the magic and version numbers.
00275                         m_file.writeLine("#%Magic=" + ::getInt((int)gdata.Header().GetMagicNumber()));
00276                         m_file.writeLine("#%Version=" + ::getInt((int)gdata.Header().GetVersion()));
00277                 }               
00278         }
00279 }

00281 /*
00282  * Output the header parameters.
00283  */
00284 void CalvinToText::OutputParameters(ParameterNameValueTypeIt &begin, ParameterNameValueTypeIt &end)
00285 {
00286         ParameterNameValueType param;
00287         ParameterNameValueTypeIt it;
00288         for (it=begin; it!=end; ++it)
00289         {
00290                 param = *it;
00291                 if (m_bHeader)
00292                 {
00293                         m_file.writeLine("#%" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) + "=" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));
00294                 }
00295                 if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-xChromosome") {m_iXChromosome = ::getInt(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));}
00296                 if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-yChromosome") {m_iYChromosome = ::getInt(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));}
00297                 if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-xChromosome") {m_iXChromosome = ::getInt(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));}
00298                 if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-yChromosome") {m_iYChromosome = ::getInt(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));}
00299         }
00300 }
00301

00305 void CalvinToText::OutputParameters(ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt &begin, ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt &end)
00306 {
00307         ParameterNameValueType param;
00308         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt it;
00309         for (it=begin; it!=end; ++it)

00311                 param = *it;
00312                 if (m_bHeader)
00313                 {
00314                         m_file.writeLine("#%" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) + "=" +StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));
00315                 }
00316                 if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-xChromosome") {m_iXChromosome = ::getInt(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));}
00317                 if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-yChromosome") {m_iYChromosome = ::getInt(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));}
00318                 if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-xChromosome") {m_iXChromosome = ::getInt(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));}
00319                 if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-yChromosome") {m_iYChromosome = ::getInt(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));}
00320 
00321         }
00322 }

00324 /*
00325  * Output the data header parameters.
00326  */
00327 void CalvinToText::OutputDataHeaderParameters(GenericDataHeader *hdr, bool bNewGuid)
00328 {
00329 //      cout << "#Data Header Information" << endl;
00330 
00331         if (m_bHeader)
00332         {
00333                 // Add the file id's.
00334                 if (hdr->GetFileId().length() > 0)
00335                 {
00336                         if (bNewGuid)
00337                         {
00338                                 m_file.writeLine("#%FileIdentifier=" + affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
00339                         }
00340                         else
00341                         {
00342                                 m_file.writeLine("#%FileIdentifier=" + hdr->GetFileId());
00343                         }
00344                 }
00345                 if (hdr->GetFileTypeId().length() > 0)
00346                 {
00347                         m_file.writeLine("#%FileTypeIdentifier=" + hdr->GetFileTypeId());
00348                 }
00349                 if (hdr->GetLocale().length() > 0)
00350                 {
00351                         m_file.writeLine("#%FileLocale=" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(hdr->GetLocale()));
00352                 }
00353         }
00354 
00355 
00356         // Add the parameters.
00357         ParameterNameValueTypeIt begin;
00358         ParameterNameValueTypeIt end;
00359         hdr->GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00360         OutputParameters(begin, end);
00361 
00362         int nParents = hdr->GetParentCnt();
00363         for (int iParent=0; iParent<nParents; iParent++)
00364         {
00365     // dont take address of temp
00366                 GenericDataHeader parent=hdr->GetParent(iParent);
00367                 OutputDataHeaderParameters(&parent, false);
00368         }
00369 }

00371 /*
00372  * Output the set information, only the header.
00373  */
00374 void CalvinToText::OutputSetInfo(GenericData &gdata, int groupIndex, int setIndex)
00375 {
00376         DataSet *pSet = gdata.DataSet(groupIndex, setIndex);
00377 //      if (!g_bNoHeader)
00378         {
00379                 m_file.writeLine("#%SetName=" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(pSet->Header().GetName()));
00380 
00381                 // Add the row and column count.
00382                 m_file.writeLine("#%Columns=" + ::getInt(pSet->Cols()));
00383                 m_file.writeLine("#%Rows=" + ::getInt(pSet->Rows()));
00384         }
00385 
00386         // Add the parameters.
00387         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt begin;
00388         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt end;
00389         pSet->Header().GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00390         OutputParameters(begin, end);
00391         OutputData(gdata, groupIndex, setIndex, 0, -1);
00392         pSet->Delete();
00393 }

00395 /*
00396  * Output the group information.
00397  */
00398 void CalvinToText::OutputGroupInfo(GenericData &gdata, const std::wstring &groupName, int groupIndex)
00399 {
00400 //      if (!g_bNoHeader)
00401         {
00402                 m_file.writeLine("#%GroupName=" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(groupName));
00403         }
00404 
00405         // Add each set.
00406         int iSetCount = gdata.DataSetCnt(groupIndex);
00407         for (int i=0; i<iSetCount; i++)
00408         {
00409                 OutputSetInfo(gdata, groupIndex, i);
00410         }
00411 }
00412 
00413 /*
00414  * Output the groups and sets.
00415  */
00416 void CalvinToText::OutputGroupsAndSets(GenericData &gdata)
00417 {
00418         // Add each group.
00419         WStringVector groupNames;
00420         gdata.DataGroupNames(groupNames);
00421         int iGroupCount = (int)groupNames.size();
00422         for (int i=0; i< iGroupCount; i++)
00423         {
00424                 OutputGroupInfo(gdata, groupNames[i], i);
00425         }
00426 }

00428 /*
00429  * Output the header information.
00430  */
00431 void CalvinToText::OutputHeader(const string &strFileName, affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& genericData, bool bNewGuid)
00432 {
00433         affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileReader reader;
00434         reader.SetFilename(strFileName);
00435         reader.Open(genericData);
00436 
00437         OutputFileHeaderParameters(genericData, bNewGuid);
00438         OutputDataHeaderParameters(genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr(), bNewGuid);
00439 }

00441 bool CalvinToText::isCalvinFile(const AffxString& strFileName)
00442 {       
00443         AffxBinaryFile file;
00444         if (!file.open(strFileName, AffxBinaryFile::LOAD)) {return false;}
00445         unsigned char ucFileType = file.readUnsignedChar(); 
00446         file.close();
00447         if (ucFileType == 59) {return true;}
00448         else {return false;}
00449 }
